meanings.definition: Containing or resembling cheese in flavor or consistency.
meanings.sent1: The pizza from that restaurant was much cheesier than the one I made at home.
meanings.sent2: The cheesier the macaroni and cheese, the better it tastes!
meanings.sent3: I couldn't help but laugh when I tasted the cheesier popcorn at the movie theater.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and cheesier as a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The cheesier sauce dripped down the sides of the nachos, making them irresistible.

meanings.definition: Of poor quality or taste; lacking sophistication or originality.
meanings.sent1: The movie we watched last night was even cheesier than the one we saw before.
meanings.sent2: The cheesier the joke, the louder my little brother laughs.
meanings.sent3: The cheesier the costume, the more fun everyone had at the party.
meanings.sent4: His excuses for being late were getting cheesier by the minute.
meanings.sent5: The cheesier the music, the more people danced at the wedding.
